content: संमत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Agreed or consented to, approved of. {@--2@} Liked, dear, beloved; <ls>R. 1. 28.</ls> {@--3@} Like, resembling. {@--4@} Regarded, considered, thought. {@--5@} Highly respected, honoured, esteemed; <ls>Pt. 1. 56.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Agreement; see संमति. {@--2@} Impression, opinion.
